summary: Diff adds a new Ramadan checklist UI section in the Fasting Tracker tab, stores a 30-boolean completion array in app settings, and updates localStorage schema/versioning with migrations and defaults. Styling uses existing UI components and a responsive grid.

missing_requirements.requirement: Checklist items should be explicitly labeled “Day 1 … Day 30” (exact 30 individually toggleable day items).
missing_requirements.reason: The new checklist renders 30 items and shows the day number (1–30), but the visible label is only the number, not “Day X” as stated in the acceptance criteria wording.
